about.description: After years of honing my skills as a technical manager and designer, I finally let myself be captivated by programming. Writing code brings me joy. I love fixing stubborn bugs and experiencing those magical moments of enlightenment when, after hours of debugging, I manage to write that one line that makes the code work 😉 Currently, I am focusing on developing programming skills in JavaScript and React/Next.js. It's a fascinating environment that gives me the opportunity to create interactive and dynamic web applications. I'm delighted to expand my knowledge and gain experience in the coding world.

contact.text-3: I love making new connections with people.
contact.text-4: Feel free to drop me an email.
